TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed ValueAnimatorRepeatMode extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Enumerates values returned by several types.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Animation.ValueAnimatorRepeatMode Restart = int32(1)

summary.para: When the animation reaches the end and repeatCount is INFINITE or a positive value, the animation restarts from the beginning.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Animation.ValueAnimatorRepeatMode Reverse = int32(2)

summary.para: When the animation reaches the end and repeatCount is INFINITE or a positive value, the animation reverses direction on every iteration.
